review: I think mine was defective.  The interface looked nice and had a lot of features, but signal quality was so low that it spent more time buffering than playing.  I know it's not my router, I have an RT-N66U, less than four months old, and I have a 1 amp amplifer on it with (2) 9" antennas and (1) external 3' antenna.  I stream 14Mbps out of my house and across the yard, and into my neighbor's house with no issues.  I stream 28Mbps to the other side of my house, through 3 walls, approximately 65 feet away...but, putting this Firestick only 18 feet away, through just one wall, yields almost no throughput at all.  I stopped using it.
